scenario1.Subject: A gargantuan, incredibly obese male surfer, tanned skin, wearing a neon green wetsuit that is stretched to its absolute molecular limit, sun-bleached messy hair, wearing mirrored pit-viper sunglasses, expression of pure adrenaline and intense focus, massive distinct double chin flapping in the wind.

scenario1.Technical(Negative Prompt): No hallucinations, no distortion of limbs, no blurry face.
